title: Rhino 7 multipipe python version
question:
Hi there,


Is it possible to script with multi-pipe in ghpython or rhino python?

I didn’t figure out a way. is it because it’s an external package?

code_blocks.code:
import Rhino
doc = Rhino.RhinoDoc.ActiveDoc
subd = ghc.Kangaroo2Component.MultiPipe([self.allcrvs], integer, None, 0, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1)
doc.Objects.AddSubD(subd)
code_blocks.author: W_ZL
